hero: The 3rd Symposium and Exhibition on Solar, Wind, and Geothermal Energy
about_content: The College of Engineering is pleased to announce the Exhibition on April 17/16, one of the most prominent scientific and technical events in the field of renewable energy. This event serves as an ideal platform for showcasing the collegeâ€™s projects and strengthening the role and reputation of the Department of Mechanical and Energy Engineering. The conference fosters interaction between students and companies, enhancing students' ability to present their academic work. Additionally, the exhibition provides a platform for experts to share insights on renewable energy and sustainability.
sponsers_title: Be Part of the Event Sponsors!
sponsers_content: If you are interested in sponsorship and support, contact us via email, and we will be happy to collaborate with you.
